Articles.Content:
Hi Guys. Don't post much, but I thought you could check out what I've been working on the last few days.

Was starting a Mun colonization mission when this song came on Pandora and I got inspired to try my hand at a video edit.

Happy to answer any questions or receive feedback if there is any. You might notice some small ship-design inconsistencies.. Let's just say it took quite a few attempts at getting the landing right

Make sure to go 1080p and full screen
